licenseNote: Exactly 100 checklist entries. Each item = 1%. Variant / upgrade pairs aggregated using '-all' suffix where needed.

items.location_text:
Obtained as a reward for beating the Phantom boss fight in the Exhaust Organ area of
          Bilewater.
Bind Grand Mother Silk's arm at the top of The Cradle during Act 3.
Bind the statue in the Weavenest Karn area to the west of the Wormways.
Bind the statue in the Mosshome area of Moss Grotto.
Obtained as a reward for beating the First Sinner boss fight at The Slab.
Bind the statue in the Craw Lake area of Greymoor.

Purchase from Jubilana in Songclave for 350 Rosaries after completing the The Wandering
          Merchant Wish.
Found on a bug corpse in Sinner's Road.

Obtained as a reward for beating the Trobbio boss fight in the Stage area of the
          Whispering Vaults.
Crafted at a table in the High Falls area. Requires one Craftmetal.

Crafted by Twelfth Architect in the Underworks area. Requires one Craftmetal and 360
          Rosaries.
Purchase from Shakra for 70 Rosaries.
Found in the Coral Tower cave in the Sands of Karak area.
Purchase from Mottled Skarr in the Hunter's March area for 140 Rosaries.
Found on a bug corpse in the Wormways area.
Found on a table in the southwestern part of the Underworks area.

Obtained as a reward for completing
          
            the Berry Picking Wish
          
          for Moss Druid in the Moss Home area.

Obtained as a reward for completing the Lost Fleas Wish for Fleamaster Mooshka in The
          Marrow.
Obtained as a reward for finding five fleas for Fleamaster Mooshka in The Marrow.
Found on a table in the Deep Docks area.
Purchase from Mottled Skarr in the Hunter's March area for 260 Rosaries.
Found on a table in the Whiteward area.

Obtained as a reward for completing the Broodfeast Wish for the Huntress in the Putrefied
          Ducts area.
Found behind the pink wasp nest in the Shellwood area.

Crafted by Forge Daughter in the Deep Docks area. Requires one Craftmetal and 110
          Rosaries.
Purchase from Pebb in the Bonebottom area for 120 Rosaries.
Repeatedly beat Lumble the Lucky while playing the Dice mini-game.
Found behind a wall of ice in the Mount Fay area.

Purchase from Frey in the Bellheart area for 880 Rosaries after completing the My Missing
          Courier Wish.

Obtained as a reward for beating the Pinstress boss fight in the Mount Fay area during Act
          3.

Crafted at a table in the area above Yarnaby's bellhome in Greymoor. Requires one
          Craftmetal.

Obtained as a reward for completing the Alchemist's Assistant Wish for Alchemist Zylotol
          in the Wormways area.

Obtained as a reward for completing
          
            the Rite of the Pollip Wish
          
          for Greyroot in the Shellwood area.
Found by breaking through a false ceiling in the Bilewater area.

Obtained as a reward for beating the Second Sentinel boss fight in the southeastern part
          of The Forum.
Found on a table in the Forum area of High Halls.

Crafted by Twelfth Architect in the Underworks area. Requires one Craftmetal and 230
          Rosaries.

Crafted by Twelfth Architect in the Underworks area. Requires one Craftmetal and 140
          Rosaries.
Found on a table in The Marrow.

Find the Ruined Tool in the southeastern part of Bilewater and then take it to Forge
          Daughter in the Deep Docks area.
Obtained after sprinting across the chamber in the Weavenest Cindril area of Far Fields.
Purchase from Grindle in the Blasted Steps area for 740 Rosaries.

Purchase from Jubilana in Songclave for 320 Rosaries after completing the The Lost
          Merchant Wish.

Purchase from Jubilana in Songclave for 720 Rosaries after completing the The Wandering
          Merchant Wish.

Crafted by Forge Daughter in the Deep Docks area. Requires one Craftmetal and 140
          Rosaries.
Found on a table in the area above Grindle's cell in The Marrow.

Obtained as a reward for completing the Roach Guts Wish for Crull and Benjin in the
          Sinner's Road area.
Purchase from Grindle in the Blasted Steps area for 350 Rosaries.
Found in a secret cave above the Craw Lake area of Greymoor.

Trigger the Trail's End Wish using the wishboard in Bellhart, then find Shakra in the most
          northeasterly part of Bilewater.

Obtained as a reward for beating the Voltvyrm boss fight in the Voltnest area of Sands of
          Karak.
Found on a table in the northeastern part of the Memorium area during Act 3.
Found on a platform in the Far Fields area.
Obtained as a reward for beating the Moss Mothers boss fight in Weavenest Atla.
Purchase from Mort in the Pilgrim's Rest area of Far Fields for 160 Rosaries.

Obtained as a reward for beating the Father of the Flame boss fight in the section of
          Bellheart to the west of Wisp Thicket.
Found on a platform in the Putrified Ducts area.
